player module¶

class player.Player(color, surface, keys)¶

Bases: entity.Entity

Class that handles players

draw()¶

Draws a track of the player, drawing a line between its old and new position.

get_color()¶

Returns color of the player.

get_speed()¶

Returns speed of the player.

get_turn()¶

Returns turn which the player is able to do.

reset()¶

Resets players properties.

set_speed(speed)¶

Sets speed for the player.

set_track(track)¶

Sets ‘track’ surface. :param track: surface with track drawn on it

set_turn(turn)¶

Sets turn which the player is able to do.

steer(powerup)¶

Handles steering over the player and calculates movement. :param powerup: powerup to check if it was ‘taken’ by the player
